mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAL(CAL_NO, CAL_TITLE, CAL_CONTENT, CAL_START, CAL_STOP, CAL_TYPE, CAL_OPEN_YN) VALUES(CAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cal_title}, #{cal_content}, TO_DATE(#{cal_start}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{cal_stop}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') ,${cal_type}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT CAL_NO, CAL_TITLE, CAL_CONTENT, CAL_START, CAL_STOP, CAL_OPEN_YN FROM CAL WHERE CAL_DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE CAL SET "CAL_START" = TO_DATE(#{cal_start},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), "CAL_STOP" = TO_DATE(#{cal_stop},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') WHERE CAL_NO = #{cal_no}
